html.p: Splunk Lab is the quick and easy way to spin up an instance of Splunk in Docker to do ad-hoc data analysis on one or more logfiles or REST/RSS endpoints!

ul.li: Search "_internal" Index over the last hour - This is guaranteed to have data from Splunk itself
Search "main" Index over the last day - This will not have data unless there are files in your logs/ directory or you have turned on HTTP or REST data ingestion.
Rest Data Endpoints - Turn these on to get current BitCoin prices, stock prices, Philly Weather, and more!
Syndication Feed - Turn these on to get RSS feeds from places like CNN, Flickr, and Splunk Questions
Splunk ML Toolkit - If the splunk-lab-ml image was used, Machine Learning will be available.
